page.title: 10Day in The Life(cont.)
page.content: Morning at work consists of 2 hours appointed surgery,mail,patient and administrative correspondence followed by house calls.Visits to local Nursing Homes,and a school for whom I'm Medical Officer,meetings with the district nurses and midwife,and attendance at Case Conferences with social worker also take up a variable amount of time during this period. I try to stop for lunch at about 1.30.This is sometimes interupted by 'phone calls.If not I may also take the chance of a short sleep following a busy night on duty. My wife may have visited the shops ,attended a committee meeting,or tidied the childrens roomsfor the 10th time in the week during the morning but manages to remain in control of lunch,and has also written letters and paid the bills.
